# vertexDescriptor

**Instance Property**

The organization of vertex data in an attribute’s argument table.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var vertexDescriptor: MTLVertexDescriptor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexDescriptor] instance is used to describe the organization of per-vertex input structs passed in an argument of a vertex shader function.
